ðŸ“– Summary: Vet is an open source software supply chain security tool designed for developers and security engineers. It offers features such as vulnerability and malicious package detection, policy as code using CEL, and real-time protection powered by SafeDep Cloud. Vet supports multiple ecosystems and integrates with CI/CD pipelines for DevSecOps workflows.
